title: Charles Barkley reacts to Ben Simmons' situation with the Sixers | NBA on TNT
author: NBA on TNT
description:
The Inside crew discusses Ben Simmons' return to Philly & one-game suspension for conduct detrimental to the team.

Watch highlights from Inside the NBA with Shaq, Charles Barkley, Kenny Smith and Ernie Johnson and more! Subscribe now to be updated on the latest videos: https://www.youtube.com/nbaontnt?sub_confirmation=1
